meanings.definition: A piece of work to be done or undertaken
meanings.sent1: My teacher gave me several tasks to complete over the weekend.
meanings.sent2: Completing daily tasks helps me stay organized and productive.
meanings.sent3: I tried to convince my dog to do my tasks for me, but he just wagged his tail.
meanings.sent4: The tasks on my to-do list piled up like a mountain, daunting and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The tasks at hand felt like heavy burdens on my shoulders, weighing me down.

meanings.sent1: One of my tasks as a student is to study for exams regularly.
meanings.sent2: As a parent, taking care of my children is one of my most important tasks.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks her only task is to nap all day, what a life!
meanings.sent4: The task of keeping the house clean felt like a never-ending battle.
meanings.sent5: The task of teaching young minds is both challenging and rewarding.

meanings.definition: To assign a task to someone
meanings.sent1: I will tasks you with organizing the event decorations.
meanings.sent2: The manager tasks each team member with specific responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: I tried to tasks my little brother with cleaning his room, but he just played instead.
meanings.sent4: She tasks her assistant with scheduling all her appointments.
meanings.sent5: The teacher tasks the students with completing a group project together.
